Literature.Title: Beta-sheet pore-forming peptides selected from a rational combinatorial library: mechanism of pore formation in lipid vesicles and activity in biological membranes.
Literature.Author: Rausch JM, Marks JR, Rathinakumar R, Wimley WC

Literature.Title: Rational combinatorial design of pore-forming beta-sheet peptides.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2005;102:10511-10515
Literature.Author: Rausch JM, Marks JR, Wimley WC

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:35% Hemolysis=15 µM,Human erythrocytes:25% Hemolysis=15 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli NapIV(MSC=0.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus FDA 209(MSC=2.1±0.4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MSC=0.8µM),Cryptococcus neoformans 184-A(MSC=4.5±0.9µM)
